author: Ron Miller
title: Palo Alto Networks to acquire CloudGenix for $420M
description: Palo Alto Networks announced today that it has an agreement in place to acquire CloudGenix for $420 million. CloudGenix delivers a software-defined wide area network (SD-WAN) that helps customers stay secure by setting policies to enforce compliance with comp…
content:
Palo Alto Networks announced today that it has an agreement in place to acquire CloudGenix for $420 million.
CloudGenix delivers a software-defined wide area network (SD-WAN) that helps customers stay secure by setting policies to enforce compliance with com… [+1385 chars]
